other_tests.findings: Large inflammatory collection centered in the right lower quadrant, approximately 6.4 x 4.0 cm, likely representing perforated appendix with abscess formation. Inflammation of the adjacent colon and terminal ileum is likely reactive. No pneumoperitoneum. Small amount of adjacent low density free pelvic fluid.
Physical Exam upon admission: Tenderness in the right lower quadrant, no guarding/rebound.
